price: Dan apa yang telah Kami wahyukan kepadamu, yaitu Alkitab (Al-Qur`ān) itulah yang benar dengan membenarkan kitab-kitab yang sebelumnya.  Sesungguhnya Allah benar-benar Maha Mengetahui lagi Maha Melihat (keadaan) hamba-hamba-Nya.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِيٓ أَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ مِنَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ هُوَ ٱلۡحَقُّ مُصَدِّقٗا لِّمَا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِعِبَادِهِۦ لَخَبِيرُۢ بَصِيرٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhī awḥaynā ilayka mina al-kitābi huwa al-ḥaqu muṣaddiqan limā bayna yadayhi inna al-laha biʿibādihi lakhabīrun baṣīrun
